HomePage.description1: Headpat Place is an online social media community. We voluntarily offer our members a platform for connecting, exchanging and expressing.

Login.MinPasswordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
Login.MinUsernameLength: Username must be at least 3 characters
Login.MaxPasswordLength: Password must be at most 256 characters
Login.AcceptedTerms: You must accept the terms and conditions

SupportPage.helpDescription: Check below for all the ways you can get in touch with us.
SupportPage.discordDescription: Join our Discord server and ask for help by creating a ticket at
SupportPage.emailDescription: Sending us an E-Mail will get you the support you need, however it might take 24-48 hours. If you require faster help, please send us a message via Discord. Our E-Mail is
SupportPage.githubDescription: Did you know that our App & Website are both open-source? What if I told you that you can help us create something big! Come and look around in our GitHub:

LegalPage.legalInfoDescription: All the legal information about our website and app.
LegalPage.aboutDescription: Here you can download all the legal documents that are related to the use of our website or app. If you have any questions, please contact us at
